0.0.3.en: Support for G1 valves, German translation added by Dirk Göbel

0.0.4.en: Fix crash if no data returned from LinkTap. Fix Clear Log button.

0.0.5.en: Fix issue with app settings not taking effect until the app is restarted. Fixed issue with the Turn Off Instant Mode flow card.

0.0.6.en: Fixed issue with the water volume. Reset cycle remaining when instanat mode is cancelled.

0.0.7.en: Changed Water Volume units to L.

0.0.8.en: Added On / Off capability for quick instant mode activation / deactivation

0.0.9.en: Added more diagnostics to see what is sent to LinkTap. Fixed issue with new On / Off capability not being added early enough.

0.0.10.en: Fix error when activating instant mode on G1 tapLinkers.

0.0.11.en: Trap POST errors, Added instructions and LinkTap URL to obtain API key

0.0.12.en: Added a button to obtain an API key

0.0.13.en: Added Dutch translation courtesy of Roy Kokkelkoren

1.0.0.en: Major rewrite to use webhooks instead of polling. The app is now much more responsive but uses less CPU resources. Some capabilities have been removed or changed and there are also some new ones.

1.0.1.en: Major rewrite to use webhooks instead of polling. The app is now much more responsive but uses less CPU resources. Some capabilities have been removed or changed and there are also some new ones. Added lost Dutch translations

1.0.2.en: Major rewrite to use webhooks instead of polling. The app is now much more responsive but uses less CPU resources. Some capabilities have been removed or changed and there are also some new ones. Added lost Dutch translations. Fix issue with G1 valves as they don't have the 'Fall' alarm

1.0.3.en: Major rewrite to use webhooks instead of polling. The app is now much more responsive but uses less CPU resources. Some capabilities have been removed or changed and there are also some new ones. Added lost Dutch translations. Fix issue with G1 valves as they don't have the 'Fall' alarm. Added missing Calendar Mode.

1.0.4.en: Major rewrite to use webhooks instead of polling. The app is now much more responsive but uses less CPU resources. Some capabilities have been removed or changed and there are also some new ones. Added lost Dutch translations. Fix issue with G1 valves as they don't have the 'Fall' alarm. Added missing Calendar Mode. Add missing German translations thanks to Dirk Göbel

1.0.5.en: Major rewrite to use webhooks instead of polling. The app is now much more responsive but uses less CPU resources. Some capabilities have been removed or changed and there are also some new ones. Added lost Dutch translations. Fix issue with G1 valves as they don't have the 'Fall' alarm. Added missing Calendar Mode. Add missing German translations thanks to Dirk Göbel

1.0.6.en: Major rewrite to use webhooks instead of polling. The app is now much more responsive but uses less CPU resources. Some capabilities have been removed or changed and there are also some new ones. Added lost Dutch translations. Fix issue with G1 valves as they don't have the 'Fall' alarm. Added missing Calendar Mode. Add missing German translations thanks to Dirk Göbel. Improved pair and repair proces

1.0.7.en: Major rewrite to use webhooks instead of polling. The app is now much more responsive but uses less CPU resources. Some capabilities have been removed or changed and there are also some new ones. Improved error message when login failed. Attempt to create a new key if fetching the key fails.

1.0.8.en: Major rewrite to use webhooks instead of polling. The app is now much more responsive but uses less CPU resources. Some capabilities have been removed or changed and there are also some new ones. Improved error message when login failed. Attempt to create a new key if fetching the key fails.

1.0.9.en: Major rewrite to use webhooks instead of polling. The app is now much more responsive but uses less CPU resources. Some capabilities have been removed or changed and there are also some new ones. Improved error message when login failed. Attempt to create a new key if fetching the key fails.

1.0.10.en: Major rewrite to use webhooks instead of polling. The app is now much more responsive but uses less CPU resources. Some capabilities have been removed or changed and there are also some new ones. Improved error message when login failed. Attempt to create a new key if fetching the key fails.

1.0.11.en: Major rewrite to use webhooks instead of polling. The app is now much more responsive but uses less CPU resources. Some capabilities have been removed or changed and there are also some new ones. Login in is now presented during pairing.

1.0.12.en: Added Send Log as a maintenance action.

1.0.15.en: Remove async from web hook message processing to assure synchronous processing.

1.0.17.en: Changed to await for setting capabilities.

1.0.18.en: Changed to await for setting capabilities.

1.0.19.en: Split time remaining / elapsed into two capabilities.

1.0.20.en: Major rewrite to use webhooks instead of polling. The app is now much more responsive but uses less CPU resources. Some capabilities have been removed or changed and there are also some new ones. Login in is now presented during pairing.

1.0.22.en: Added 'Total water used' for accumulated water volume. Changed battery quantity from 2 to 4.

1.0.23.en: Changed 'Total water used' units to m³.

1.0.24.en: Catch failure to register webhook and retry.

1.0.25.en: Revert to previous watering plan when Instant mode stopped manually.
